item.description:
Harry Potter won't be available in IMAX until July 29th. As a result, we'll see the regular show this Saturday! I don't know about you, but I can't wait!

Here's a link to purchase tickets. Where this is opening weekend, please purchase your tickets NOW!
Buy Tickets Before They Sell Out! Click HERE!


The movie starts at 6:50. Let's meet by 6:30 so we can all get seats together.



Let's go see the new Harry Potter movie opening weekend! I'll add a link to buy tickets online once we're closer to the date. We'll have to buy tickets in advance so it doesn't sell out.



I hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be standing on the right after you enter the building.
item.name: Movie Night: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
